parsing_result:
## Input/output terminals

- **Microphone connector:** ø3.5 mm mini-stereo jack
- **Headphone jack socket:** The USB connector can be converted to a headphone jack using the supplied headphone adapter
- **Remote release connector:** ø3.5 mm 3-pole mini jack
- **Digital input/output:** USB connector (Type-C) USB3.2 Gen1x1
- **HDMI output:** HDMI Micro connector (type D)

## Power supply/other

- **Power supply:** NP-W126S rechargeable battery (supplied with camera)

### Battery life

- **Battery type:** NP-W126S
- **Lens:** XF35mmF1.4 R
- **External flash units:** Disabled
- **Shooting mode:** Mode P

| PERFORMANCE | Number of shots |
|-------------|-----------------|
| **LCD**     |                 |
| BOOST       | Approx. 270     |
| NORMAL      | Approx. 460     |
| **EVF**     |                 |
| BOOST       | Approx. 270     |
| NORMAL      | Approx. 430     |

### Total length of footage that can be recorded on a single charge

| Mode               | Actual battery life of movie capture | Continuance battery life of movie capture |
|--------------------|--------------------------------------|------------------------------------------|
| **4K**<sup>1</sup> | Approx. 45 minutes                   | Approx. 60 minutes                       |
| **FHD**<sup>2</sup>| Approx. 50 minutes                   | Approx. 75 minutes                       |
| **High-speed movies**<sup>3</sup> | Approx. 80 minutes | -                                        |

1. At a frame rate of 29.97 fps.
2. At a frame rate of 59.94 fps.
3. At a frame rate of 120 fps.

CIPA standard. Measured using battery supplied with camera and SD memory card.

> **Note:** Battery endurance varies with battery charge level and the figures given above are not guaranteed. Battery endurance will decline at low temperatures.
